SELECT
COUNT(1) number FROM qyjc_sy.qy_expertbasdoc p LEFT JOIN qyjc_sy.qy_shop_info s ON p.orgn_id = s.ORGN_ID WHERE p.is_del = 'N' AND p.is_top = 'Y'
AND p.create_date < NOW()

SELECT COUNT( p.expert_id ) number, DATE_FORMAT(p.create_date,'%Y') areas FROM qyjc_sy.qy_expertbasdoc p WHERE p.is_del = 'N' AND p.is_top = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(p.create_date,'%Y') IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(p.create_date,'%Y') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT( p.create_date, '%Y')

SELECT IF ( 服务领域 IS NULL, '领域未填写',服务领域) areas, count( 1 ) number FROM ( SELECT d2.DICT_VALUE AS '服务领域', e.expert_id FROM qyjc_sy.qy_expertbasdoc e LEFT JOIN bfw_data_dict d ON d.DICT_KEY = e.industrial_field AND d.DICT_CODE = 'SERVICE_DOMAIN' AND d.DICT_LEVEL = 2 LEFT JOIN bfw_data_dict d2 ON d.PARENT_KEY = d2.DICT_KEY AND d2.DICT_CODE = 'SERVICE_DOMAIN' WHERE is_del = 'N' AND is_top = 'Y' ) a GROUP BY a.`服务领域` ORDER BY count( 1 ) DESC;
